vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.26
§ Helez = "he has saved"
1) an Ephraimite, one of the 30 of David's mighty warriors, leader of the 7th monthly course
2) a man of Judah, son of Azariah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   lomo; (2a)   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (2b)   descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希利斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他已拯救"
1) 一位以法蓮人, 大衛王的卅個大能勇士之一, 統領負責在第七個月的於王室服事的人
2) 猶大人亞撒利雅的兒子 (代上 2:39)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希利斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他已拯救"
1) 一位以法莲人, 大卫王的卅个大能勇士之一, 统领负责在第七个月的于王室服事的人
2) 犹大人亚撒利雅的儿子 (代上 2:39)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.39;
son of: Azariah (H5838J);
father of: Eleasah (H0501)
§ Helez = "he has saved"
1) an Ephraimite, one of the 30 of David's mighty warriors, leader of the 7th monthly course
2) a man of Judah, son of Azariah
